ghostPage.title: Developer Tools
ghostPage.excerpt:
These are are a few development tools which have caught out attention recently,
and come reccommended. These take the form of Python libraries, NPM packages, or
SaaS products we find particularly interesting.

We don't gain anything from endorsing these links, nor are we affilifiated in
any way. These are merely tools which have grabbed our interest.

authors.name: Todd Birchard
authors.bio: Product manager turned engineer with an ongoing identity crisis. Breaks everything before learning best practices. Completely normal and emotionally stable.

primary_author.name: Todd Birchard
